Ragnar transformed so she could see he was no more transformer than
she was human. He then waved her to follow him.

Ragnar: Unfortunately this is Earth... its prehistoric form in fact.
But I am no Autobot. My name is Ragnar and I am a human Star Colonel
in Clan Ghost Bear. It is a long story. Come now. The base is no more
than a few hours away.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 1/16/03 6:07:03 AM Central Standard Time, 
> cardhead649@y... writes:
> 
> 
> > "You kids have fun together, y'hear?"  Jackie's voice is a bit 
> > muffled, since he's almost literally buried in his self-assigned 
> > repair job.
> > 
> 
> She glanced back at the Autobot. She heard him, her sensory system was 
> strong. She smirked. At least her memories were still with her. For
some 
> reason, instead of wanting to rip him to shreads, she just smirked.
She felt 
> alone still. Kindred souls may be upon this planet, but she still
felt alone. 
> 
> 
> Plans started to form in her head. 
> 
> She padded out of the crashed shuttle, stepping outside. She glanced
about. 
> "This.. is the mudball Earth?" A little disappointed. It was more to
herself, 
> she didn't expect an answer. 
> 
> She glanced at Ragnar. "Which way, Autobot?"
